pullRequest.title: CLDR-13498 Language name Root should not be open for data contribution
pullRequest.bodyText:
-Skip ROOT_ID for CLDRFile.LANGUAGE_NAME in the loop that iterates over sc.getSurveyToolDisplayCodes
-Remove dead code, revise outdated comments

Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-13498
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

commit.message:
CLDR-13498 Language name Root should not be open for data contribution

-Skip ROOT_ID for CLDRFile.LANGUAGE_NAME in the loop that iterates over sc.getSurveyToolDisplayCodes

-Remove dead code, revise outdated comments

nodes.bodyText: This is what fixes the bug; other changes are just clean-up
